plot: Writer and commentator Eric Margolis journeys to fascinating destinations around the globe for a deeper look into these places and their people to convey the unique values and human touchstones of these locales.
title: The Other Side
plot_es: Writer and commentator Eric Margolis journeys to fascinating destinations around the globe for a deeper look into these places and their people to convey the unique values and human touchstones of these locales.
plot_en: Writer and commentator Eric Margolis journeys to fascinating destinations around the globe for a deeper look into these places and their people to convey the unique values and human touchstones of these locales.
